name: TiFN
goal: To bring together academia, research organisations and industry and other private parties for the purpose of conducting pre- and non-competitive fundamental/strategic public-private research projects in the field of consumer engagement, healthy nutriition and sustainable food systems.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Consumers, Food Safety, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Horizon 2020, Horizon Europe, Joint Programming Initiative Healty Diet for Healty Lives
